Description: Glass bowl; mould-blown from semi-transparent light greenish slightly bubbly glass with a dimpled base with pontil scar; complete.
Findspot: Found/Acquired: Egypt, Said to have been found together with 1887,1121.1-10.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Augustus Wollaston Franks (?)
Acquisition notes: Paper label on underside implies this passed through Franks.
